com.lab.train

Class Lab_CreateTraining_File

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lab.train.Lab_CreateTraining_File

  • public class Lab_CreateTraining_File
extends java.lang.Object
    This class creates the Training File(s) required for training the domain-dependent model. For each file and each tag, it performs the following: 1. Calculate the header distance by invoking the web service hosted at python end. 2. Calculate the body distance by invoking the web service hosted at python end. 3. Calculate the length. 4. Assign the label by checking with the gold version. Labels are: Header = 0 Body = 1 Junk = 2 Then it creates a csv file with the training data.
